text: We may use your personal information from the Website or Application in the following ways: To provide usage data, billing notices, or other information to Clients.

We may use both session cookies (which expire once you close your web browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your computer until you delete them) when you interact with Warpwire through our Website, any emails we send you, any of our social media accounts, or through interaction with our Application.
We use cookies to provide you with a more personal and interactive experience on our Website and/or Application.
